messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE NAME: The Whispering Woods Whodunit DATE: 05/05/05 The courtroom was abuzz with animated deliberation as the trial progressed. The prosecution summoned the officers instrumental to the investigation to elucidate on their findings. LAW ENFORCEMENT TESTIMONY: PROSECUTOR: Please state your name and role in the investigation. WITNESS: I am Captain A. B. Anderson, the chief investigator in this case. PROSECUTOR: Thank you, Captain Anderson. Can you narrate the events on the day the whodunit was discovered? WITNESS: Certainly. On the evening of March 3rd, Officer C. D. Dawson stumbled upon a puzzling scene in the Whispering Woods and reported it. The investigation was initiated forthwith. PROSECUTOR: Who was assigned to evidence collection? WITNESS: Sergeant E. F. Franklin and Technician G. H. Harper were responsible for gathering and examining the evidence. PROSECUTOR: Who conducted the primary interrogations? WITNESS: Detective I. J. Jackson and Detective K. L. Lee spearheaded the interrogations of suspects and potential witnesses. PROSECUTOR: Thank you. No further questions. The Defense conducted a stringent cross-examination of Captain Anderson regarding the investigative techniques. Throughout the trial, Patrol Officer M. N. Norton, Patrol Officer O. P. Peterson, and Patrol Officer Q. R. Roberts were also brought forth to testify.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Captain A. B. Anderson 
Officer Context: Captain Anderson is the chief investigator in the Whispering Woods Whodunit case, narrating the events on the day the whodunit was discovered during the trial. 
Officer Role: Captain 

Officer Name: Officer C. D. Dawson 
Officer Context: Officer Dawson discovered a puzzling scene in the Whispering Woods on the evening of March 3rd, which initiated the investigation. 
Officer Role: Officer 

Officer Name: Sergeant E. F. Franklin 
Officer Context: Sergeant Franklin, alongside Technician G. H. Harper, was assigned to evidence collection and examination related to the case. 
Officer Role: Sergeant 

Officer Name: Technician G. H. Harper 
Officer Context: Technician Harper worked with Sergeant E. F. Franklin on gathering and examining the evidence concerning the puzzling scene in the Whispering Woods. 
Officer Role: Technician 

Officer Name: Detective I. J. Jackson 
Officer Context: Detective Jackson, alongside Detective K. L. Lee, conducted the primary interrogations of suspects and potential witnesses to gather more information regarding the whodunit. 
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Detective K. L. Lee 
Officer Context: Detective Lee, along with Detective I. J. Jackson, spearheaded the interrogations to collect additional information about the incident. 
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Patrol Officer M. N. Norton 
Officer Context: Patrol Officer Norton was summoned to testify during the trial, although their specific role in the investigation was not detailed in the transcript. 
Officer Role: Patrol Officer 

Officer Name: Patrol Officer O. P. Peterson 
Officer Context: Patrol Officer Peterson was also called to testify during the trial, although their specific role in the investigation was not detailed in the transcript. 
Officer Role: Patrol Officer 

Officer Name: Patrol Officer Q. R. Roberts 
Officer Context: Patrol Officer Roberts was brought to testify during the trial, although their specific role in the investigation was not detailed in the transcript. 
Officer Role: Patrol Officer
